inconsistent_setting.name: Doesn't follow from setting described (excluding last action)
inconsistent_setting.description: This response is inconsistent with the current state of the world. For example, 'The table catches fire' would be an inconsistent narration for with a room without a table, or if the table was previously described as wet.

inconsistent_action.name: Doesn't follow from last action
inconsistent_action.description: This response seems like a unreasonable result of my action. For example 'The house burns down' would be an unreasonable narration for the action 'eat apple'.

disfluent.name: Grammatical/Spelling issues
disfluent.description: This response cannot be clearly understood due to grammatical or lexical errors.

none_all_good.name: None, all good
none_all_good.description: This response implies that there are no problems with the data
